message: Let's split it evenly to start, I'll give you a fair chance to make a counteroffer.
I'll take a bigger share this time, but I'm willing to compromise
I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not willing to give up too much. You can try to counter again.
I'm taking a bigger risk, but I'm confident I can get a better deal
I'm getting desperate, but I'll give you a slightly better deal. This is my last chance to negotiate.
